translations: n.[外科] 清创术；扩创术；创伤切开法

phrs.translation: 清创术, 清创, 清理术, 病灶清除术
局部化疗, 局部清创
关节镜清理术, 关节镜下清理术

sentences.sentence: Under general anesthesia or periotic nerve block anesthesia, 56 patients of auricle laceration underwent microsurgical debridement.
sentences.translation: 56例耳廓挫裂伤患者，在全麻或耳周神经阻滞麻醉下行显微清创缝合。

sentences.sentence: To explore the cure effect of debridement and bone? Transplantation internal fixation on spinal tuberculosis.
sentences.translation: 探讨病灶清除植骨内固定术治疗脊柱结核的疗效。

sentences.sentence: All 8 patients underwent surgical debridement, and resection of the infected prosthesis was performed in 7 of the 9 joints.
sentences.translation: 所有的8位患者行外科清创术以及在9例关节中7例行感染关节切除术。
